org.soulwing.snmp

Class SnmpFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.soulwing.snmp.SnmpFactory

  • public class SnmpFactory
extends Object
    A factory that produces contexts and listeners for SNMP.
    Author:
    Carl Harris

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes this factory, releasing any resources it might be holding.
      SimpleSnmpTargetConfig getDefaultTargetConfig()
      Gets the default configuration that will be used for new context instances created by this factory.
      ExecutorService getExecutorService()
      Gets the executor service that should be used for short-lived tasks.

      Gets the singleton factory instance.

      Gets the singleton factory instance.
      static SnmpFactory getInstance(ThreadFactory threadFactory)
      Gets the singleton factory instance.
      ScheduledExecutorService getScheduledExecutorService()
      Gets the executor service that should be used for scheduled tasks.
      ThreadFactory getThreadFactory()
      Gets the thread factory that should be used to create threads for long running tasks.
      SnmpContext newContext(SnmpTarget target)
      Gets a new SNMPv2c context using the first available provider, default MIB, and the factory's default configuration.
      SnmpContext newContext(SnmpTarget target, Mib mib)
      Gets a new SNMPv2c context using the first available provider and the factory's default configuration.
      SnmpContext newContext(SnmpTarget target, Mib mib, SnmpTargetConfig config, String providerName)
      Gets a new SNMPv2c context using the named provider.
      SnmpContext newContext(SnmpTarget target, SnmpTargetConfig config)
      Gets a new SNMPv2c context using the first available provider.
      SnmpListener newListener(int port, Mib mib)
      Creates a new listener that listens on any local address using the first available provider.
      SnmpListener newListener(Mib mib)
      Creates a new listener that listens on the default notification port with any local address, using the first available provider.
      SnmpListener newListener(String address, int port, Mib mib)
      Creates a new listener using the first available provider.
      SnmpListener newListener(String address, int port, Mib mib, String providerName)
      Creates a new listener using the named provider.
      void setDefaultTargetConfig(SimpleSnmpTargetConfig config)
      Sets the default configuration that will be used for new context instances created by this factory.

                     Mib mib)

        mib - MIB that will be passed into the context
        Returns:
        SNMP context object

      • newContext

        public SnmpContext newContext(SnmpTarget target,
                     SnmpTargetConfig config)
        Gets a new SNMPv2c context using the first available provider.
        Parameters:
        target - target agent
        config - SNMP configuration for the context
        Returns:
        SNMP context object

      • newContext

        public SnmpContext newContext(SnmpTarget target,
                     Mib mib,
                     SnmpTargetConfig config,
                     String providerName)
        Gets a new SNMPv2c context using the named provider.
        Parameters:
        target - target agent
        mib - MIB that will be passed into the context
        config - SNMP configuration for the context
        providerName - name of the desired provider
        Returns:
        SNMP context object
        Throws:
        ProviderNotFoundException - if the named provider cannot be found on the class path

      • newListener

        public SnmpListener newListener(Mib mib)
        Creates a new listener that listens on the default notification port with any local address, using the first available provider.
        Parameters:
        mib - MIB that will be passed into the listener
        Returns:
        SNMP notification listener

      • newListener

        public SnmpListener newListener(int port,
                       Mib mib)
        Creates a new listener that listens on any local address using the first available provider.
        Parameters:
        port - port on which to listen
        mib - MIB that will be passed into the listener
        Returns:
        SNMP notification listener

      • newListener

        public SnmpListener newListener(String address,
                       int port,
                       Mib mib)
        Creates a new listener using the first available provider.
        Parameters:
        address - local address on which to listen or null to bind to any local address
        port - port on which to listen
        mib - MIB that will be passed into the listener
        Returns:
        SNMP notification listener

      • newListener

        public SnmpListener newListener(String address,
                       int port,
                       Mib mib,
                       String providerName)
        Creates a new listener using the named provider.
        Parameters:
        address - local address on which to listen or null to bind to any local address
        port - port on which to listen
        mib - MIB that will be passed into the listener
        providerName - name of the desired provider or null to use first available provider
        Returns:
        SNMP notification listener
